reuters.title: DSC <DIGI>, AMERITECH'S <AIT> OHIO BELL IN DEAL
reuters.body: DSC Communications Corp said it was selected by American Information Technology Corp's <AIT> Ohio Bell Telephone Co as a vendor of digital electronic cross-connect systems. The systems are used to interconnect both low and high speed digital transmission links while providomg access to individual voice/data channels embedded within these links. . Reuter 
